TopicTitle: "Recover all debris" button in tracking station

Articles.Content: If I want to recover debris from the tracking station, I have to click each one individually. A "Collect all recoverable debris" button would be really handy.
Such a feature would definitely be convenient, yes.

There may be a piece or two which you want to keep, such as full fuel tank with docking port in orbit. And you may still want to "clean up" after a crash. So my vote is for ability to select multiple debris pieces at once and then delete/recover all selected.

And/or ability to rename/retype ships from tracking station so I can reassign my flying tanks to some other ship type.
Multi-select would be nice. You could also disable persistent debris, it certainly sped up the game on my laptop.
+1 vote to the multi select with a select all button instead of recover all button
